00335 // Inlined methods for RoutingConnectionData

00338 inline void
00339 RoutingConnectionData::readFromBuffer(DataBuffer* buff)
00340 {
00341    m_costA = buff->readNextLongAligned();
00342    m_costB = buff->readNextLongAligned();  
00343    m_costC = buff->readNextLongAligned();
00344    buff->readNextLongAligned(); // Cost D - now removed
00345    m_vehicleRestriction = buff->readNextLong();
00346 #if 0
00347    if ( m_costA > MAX_UINT16 ) {
00348       mc2dbg << "[RCD]: m_costA > MAX_UINT16" << endl;
00349    }
00350    if ( m_costB > MAX_UINT16 ) {
00351       mc2dbg << "[RCD]: m_costB > MAX_UINT16" << endl;
00352    }
00353    if ( m_costC > MAX_UINT16 ) {
00354       mc2dbg << "[RCD]: m_costC > MAX_UINT16" << endl;
00355    }
00356    if ( costD > MAX_UINT16 ) {
00357       mc2dbg << "[RCD]: m_costD > MAX_UINT16" << endl;
00358    }
00359 #endif
00360 }

00363 
00364 inline uint32
00365 RoutingConnectionData::getCostA(uint32 vehicleRest) const
00366 {
00367    static const uint32 specialVehicles
00368       = ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad | ItemTypes::avoidHighway;
00369    if ( MC2_UNLIKELY ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction &
00370                        specialVehicles ) ) {
00371       uint32 curCost = m_costA;
00372       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidHighway ) {
00373          curCost = uint32(curCost * Connection::highwayDefaultPenaltyFactor );
00374       }
00375       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad ) {
00376          curCost += Connection::metersToDistCost(
00377             Connection::tollRoadDistanceDefaultPenalty_m);
00378       }
00379       return curCost;
00380    } else {
00381       return m_costA;
00382    }
00383 }
00384 
00385 inline uint32
00386 RoutingConnectionData::getCostB(uint32 vehicleRest) const
00387 {
00388    static const uint32 specialVehicles
00389       = ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad | ItemTypes::avoidHighway;
00390    if ( MC2_UNLIKELY ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction &
00391                        specialVehicles ) ) {
00392       uint32 curCost = m_costB;
00393       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidHighway ) {
00394          curCost = uint32(curCost * Connection::highwayDefaultPenaltyFactor );
00395       }
00396       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad ) {
00397          curCost += Connection::secToTimeCost(
00398             Connection::tollRoadTimeDefaultPenalty_s);
00399       }
00400       return curCost;
00401    } else {
00402       return m_costB;
00403    }
00404 }
00405 
00406 inline uint32
00407 RoutingConnectionData::getCostC(uint32 vehicleRest) const
00408 {
00409    static const uint32 specialVehicles
00410       = ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad | ItemTypes::avoidHighway;
00411    if ( MC2_UNLIKELY ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction &
00412                        specialVehicles ) ) {
00413       uint32 curCost = m_costC;
00414       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidHighway ) {
00415          curCost = uint32(curCost * Connection::highwayDefaultPenaltyFactor );
00416       }
00417       if ( vehicleRest & m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::avoidTollRoad ) {
00418          curCost += Connection::secToTimeCost(
00419             Connection::tollRoadTimeDefaultPenalty_s);
00420       }
00421       return curCost;
00422    } else {
00423       return m_costC;
00424    }
00425 }

00451 inline uint32
00452 RoutingConnectionData::getVehicleRestriction(bool costC) const
00453 {
00454    if ( MC2_UNLIKELY( costC && MC2_UNLIKELY( m_costC == MAX_UINT32 ) ) ) {
00455       return m_vehicleRestriction & ItemTypes::pedestrian;
00456    } else {
00457       return m_vehicleRestriction;
00458    }   
00459 }
